name: PROJECT SP: DEMO
description:
Hi everyone!

This is the demo to our first game PROJECT: SP! In this bullet hell action RPG explore the house and help protagonist-kun figure out what's going on, as they attempt to sleep their problems away. 

There is both keyboard and controller support, but for the best possible experience, we recommend using a controller.

  • Wake up with amnesia.
  • Explore one WHOLE house!
  • Go to sleep in order to avoid an existential crisis.
  • Open TWO doors.
  • Run.
  • Dash.
  • 'n slash...with amnesia.
  • Psych major.

IF YOUR GAME IS CRASHING (especially after the first cutscene), try downloading this!

 https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=35
